00001 package liquibase.spring;
00002 
00003 import org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean;
00004 import org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware;
00005 import org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware;
00006 import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;
00007 import org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader;
00008 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00009 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00010 import liquibase.database.Database;

00015 import javax.sql.DataSource;
00016 import java.io.InputStream;
00017 import java.io.IOException;
00018 import java.io.File;
00019 import java.io.FileWriter;
00020 import java.net.URL;
00021 import java.util.Enumeration;
00022 import java.util.Vector;
00023 import java.util.TimeZone;
00024 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00025 import java.util.logging.Level;
00026 import java.sql.Connection;
00027 import java.sql.SQLException;
00028 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00029 
00073 public class SpringLiquibase implements InitializingBean, BeanNameAware, ResourceLoaderAware {
00074     public class SpringResourceOpener implements FileOpener {
00075         private String parentFile;
00076 
00077         public SpringResourceOpener(String parentFile) {
00078             this.parentFile = parentFile;
00079         }
00080 
00081 
00082         public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00083             Resource resource = getResource(file);
00084 
00085             return resource.getInputStream();
00086         }
00087 
00088         public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00089             Vector<URL> tmp = new Vector<URL>();
00090 
00091             tmp.add(getResource(packageName).getURL());
00092 
00093             return tmp.elements();
00094         }
00095 
00096         public Resource getResource(String file) {
00097             return getResourceLoader().getResource(adjustClasspath(file));
00098         }
00099 
00100         private String adjustClasspath(String file) {
00101             return isClasspathPrefixPresent(parentFile) && !isClasspathPrefixPresent(file)
00102                     ? ResourceLoader.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX + file
00103                     : file;
00104         }
00105 
00106         public boolean isClasspathPrefixPresent(String file) {
00107             return file.startsWith(ResourceLoader.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX);
00108         }
00109 
00110         public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00111             return getResourceLoader().getClassLoader();
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     private String beanName;
00116 
00117     private ResourceLoader resourceLoader;
00118 
00119     private DataSource dataSource;
00120 
00121     private boolean executeEnabled = true;
00122 
00123     private boolean writeSqlFileEnabled = true;
00124 
00125     private Logger log = Logger.getLogger(SpringLiquibase.class.getName());
00126 
00127     private String changeLog;
00128 
00129     private String contexts;
00130 
00131     private File sqlOutputDir;
00132 
00133     public SpringLiquibase() {
00134         super();
00135     }
00136 
00137     public String getDatabaseProductName() throws JDBCException {
00138         Connection connection = null;
00139         String name = "unknown";
00140         try {
00141             connection = getDataSource().getConnection();
00142             Database database =
00143                     DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(dataSource.getConnection());
00144             name = database.getDatabaseProductName();
00145         } catch (SQLException e) {
00146             throw new JDBCException(e);
00147         } finally {
00148             if (connection != null) {
00149                 try {
00150                     connection.rollback();
00151                     connection.close();
00152                 } catch (Exception e) {
00153                     log.log(Level.WARNING, "problem closing connection", e);
00154                 }
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return name;
00158     }
00159 
00165     public DataSource getDataSource() {
00166         return dataSource;
00167     }
00168 
00172     public void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource) {
00173         this.dataSource = dataSource;
00174     }
00175 
00181     public void setExecuteEnabled(boolean executeSql) {
00182         this.executeEnabled = executeSql;
00183     }
00184 
00188     public boolean isExecuteEnabled() {
00189         return executeEnabled;
00190     }
00191 
00198     public String getExecuteDisabledWarningMessage() {
00199         return "\n\nYou have set "
00200                 + getBeanName()
00201                 + ".executeEnabled=false, but there are \n"
00202                 + "database change sets that need to be run in order to bring the database up to date.\n"
00203                 + "The application may not behave properly until these changes are run.\n\n";
00204 
00205     }
00206

00214         return sqlOutputDir;
00215     }
00216 
00223     public void setSqlOutputDir(File sqlOutputDir) {
00224         this.sqlOutputDir = sqlOutputDir;
00225     }
00226 
00232     public String getChangeLog() {
00233         return changeLog;
00234     }
00235 
00240     public void setChangeLog(String dataModel) {

00242         this.changeLog = dataModel;
00243     }

00245     public String getContexts() {
00246         return contexts;
00247     }
00248 
00249     public void setContexts(String contexts) {
00250         this.contexts = contexts;
00251     }
00252 
00256     public void afterPropertiesSet() throws LiquibaseException {
00257         Connection c = null;
00258         try {
00259             c = getDataSource().getConnection();
00260             Liquibase liquibase = createLiquibase(c);
00261 
00262             if (isWriteSqlFileEnabled() && getSqlOutputDir() != null) {
00263                 if (liquibase.listUnrunChangeSets(getContexts()).size() > 0) {
00264                     log.log(Level.WARNING, getExecuteDisabledWarningMessage());
00265                 }
00266                 writeSqlFile(liquibase);
00267             }
00268 
00269             // Now execute the DDL, if so configured
00270             if (isExecuteEnabled()) {
00271                 executeSql(liquibase);
00272             }
00273         } catch (SQLException e) {
00274             throw new JDBCException(e);
00275         } finally {
00276             if (c != null) {
00277                 try {
00278                     c.rollback();
00279                     c.close();
00280                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00281                     ;
00282                 }
00283             }
00284         }
00285 
00286     }
00287 
00298     protected void writeSqlFile(Liquibase liquibase) throws LiquibaseException {
00299         FileWriter fw = null;
00300         try {
00301 
00302             File ddlDir = getSqlOutputDir();
00303             ddlDir.mkdirs();
00304             SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss");
00305             sdf.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone("UTC"));
00306             String dateString = sdf.format(new java.util.Date());
00307 
00308             String fileString = (getDatabaseProductName() + "-" + dateString + ".sql").replace(" ", "-").toLowerCase();
00309             File upgradeFile = new File(ddlDir, fileString);
00310             fw = new FileWriter(upgradeFile);
00311 
00312             liquibase.update(getContexts(), fw);
00313         } catch (IOException e) {
00314             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00315         } finally {
00316             if (fw != null) {
00317                 try {
00318                     fw.close();
00319                 } catch (IOException e) {
00320                     log.log(Level.SEVERE, "error closing fileWriter", e);
00321                 }
00322             }
00323         }
00324     }
00325 
00326     private Liquibase createLiquibase(Connection c) throws JDBCException {
00327         return new Liquibase(getChangeLog(), new SpringResourceOpener(getChangeLog()), DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(c));
00328     }
00329 
00338     protected void executeSql(Liquibase liquibase) throws LiquibaseException {
00339         liquibase.update(getContexts());
00340     }
00341 
00347     public boolean isWriteSqlFileEnabled() {
00348         return writeSqlFileEnabled;
00349     }
00350 
00354     public void setWriteSqlFileEnabled(boolean writeSqlFile) {
00355         this.writeSqlFileEnabled = writeSqlFile;
00356     }
